patthana12.2:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:1.1_1: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:1.1_2: Nahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:2.1_0: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:2.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:2.1_2: Nanahetuṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:3.1_1: Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.2:3.1_2: Nahetuṁ naappaccayañca nanahetuṁ naappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaccayo ca nanahetu naappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.2:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.2:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.2:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.2:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.2:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.2:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
